name: Detective Wizard: The Smoking Owl
description:
Story:

The Bureau of Wizardry sent you to investigate the death on a familiar. You and your rat familiar and partner, Pistachio need to uncover the truth behind the burnt smoking owl. Will you be able to catch the one behind the crime or will this be another mistake?

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

QE - Rotate Camera

F - Interact

Mouse Left Click - Chose Dialog Option

J - Open/Close Journal

Credits:

Radu-Constantin Matusa - Programming

Tomi Faludi - Programming

Bence Kiss - Programing

Andrei Mataoanu - Programing / 3D Modeling

Adam Badura - 3D Modeling / 3D Animations

Created for Create Jam Spring 2020
